scripts.blockset-prepare: blockset add ./examples/list.txt && blockset add ./examples/list2.txt && blockset add ./examples/repeat.txt
scripts.blockset-prepare-win: blockset add ./examples/list.txt --to-posix-eol && blockset add ./examples/list2.txt --to-posix-eol && blockset add ./examples/repeat.txt --to-posix-eol
